resume-job-description-0: As a squad leader, I led the development of the NetZero module, ensuring timely delivery and high-quality standards. Active in requirements refinement. Proficient in Python, Flask, JavaScript/TypeScript, Angular, AWS, Docker, MySQL, MongoDB, and agile methodologies.
resume-job-description-1: Led dev initiatives driving efficiency & innovation. Expertise in BI tools (MySQL, Pentaho, Python). Created robust web apps with Django. Developed strategic integrations (VTEX, Pinterest, Google APIs). Proficient in Python, Django, Flask, MySQL, TypeScript, React. Experienced in platform integrations. Skilled in React, NextJS. Proficient in Google Data Studio, Analytics.
resume-job-description-2: Coordination of IT technical support team, projects for infrastructure, security, improvements and Microsoft licensing. I provided an increase in the solutions offered by the company, through partnerships with Kaspersky, VMWare and Veeam.
